Mass Healing Word

Level 3 Evocation Spell

Heal up to 6 allies.

No effect on undead and constructs.

Mass Healing Word is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Mass Healing Word is a Lvl 3 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.
